mapper.sql:
a.id, a.create_date as 'createDate', a.create_user as createUser, a.update_date as 'updateDate', a.update_user as updateUser, a.delete_flag as deleteFlag, a.remark,
a.ip, a.name, a.password, a.port, a.username, a.type
mapper.select: select id, name from sys_server where delete_flag = 0
select name from sys_server where delete_flag = 0
